abilities.name: Advanced Flying
abilities.description:
This unit can fly. It now can exist on three different battlefield planes. The ground, and the air level 1, and air level 2, and air level 3. It costs 1 hex of movement to move upward but not downward.

    Additionally, you are immune to environmental effects.

abilities.name: Aerial Combat
abilities.description: Gains +1 on attacks made against flying units.

abilities.name: Aerial Evasion
abilities.description: Gains +1 to AC while in the air.

abilities.name: Alert
abilities.description: This unit always musters and can muster 1 adjacent unit (during movement).

abilities.name: Alter Emotions
abilities.description: Increase or decrease the organization (HP) of any non-elite group of soldiers by %amt%.

abilities.name: Aquatic Attack
abilities.description: Add +1 to any attack made from the water.

abilities.name: Attack from the Deeps
abilities.description: Gain +2 damage on attacks made against other targets in the water that are at ground level.

abilities.name: Attentive
abilities.description: This unit always musters

abilities.name: Basic Attack
abilities.description: You make 1 melee attack against an adjacent enemy. Roll 1d6{dmg}+%dmg%{/dmg} and do that much damage.

abilities.name: Beguile
Bless
abilities.description: Buff up an ally within range, granting them +1 on their first attack/cantrip strike of their turn.

abilities.name: Cantrip Barrage
abilities.description: Deal 1d6 damage to an enemy.

abilities.name: Charge
Dash
abilities.description: Move %movement% hexes.

abilities.name: Dash Expert
abilities.description: Once per turn, you can replace any one of your attacks with movement up to your speed.

abilities.name: Death Bomb
abilities.description: This unit can dive bomb and forcefully smash itself into enemy units. This kills this unit. It does 2 damage to a target's HP.

abilities.name: Death Ward
abilities.description: Place a ward against death on a unit. If that unit is reduced to 0 HP it instead goes to 2 HP. When this happens the spell is used up and you lose concentration on it.

abilities.name: Defend
abilities.description:
Gain    %hp% hp.

{brace}For this turn, gain the following effects:

1. You are Immune to Charge effects.
2. Enemies that move adjacent to you take 1 damage.
{/brace}

abilities.name: Deflect
abilities.description:
Block 1 ranged attack that is made at you. Declare before the attack is rolled. 

For magic attacks, deflect on a roll of %lowerRange% or higher.

abilities.name: Dive Bomb
abilities.description: When this unit moves from a higher elevation to a lower elevation it gains +1 damage for each air level it decends through for its next attack.

abilities.name: Diving
abilities.description: This unit can swim under water. Gain access to a -1 vertical space in water. Gain +3 to AC from units that are ground or above. You get a -2 dice roll on all attacks on units that are at ground or above.

abilities.name: Dominate
abilities.description: Target the leader of a company of troops and try to control their mind. Against non-elite units (so common soliders and such) this works and the unit is under your control until the battle ends or it loses half its current health. Can only have %unit% unit(s) dominated at a time.

abilities.name: Extra Versatile
abilities.description: You can choose to take actions before or after each unit of movement.

abilities.name: Ferry
abilities.description: This unit can carry other units on water. It takes 1 action to load an ally (action used during movement). No action required to disembark.

abilities.name: Flying
abilities.description:
This unit can fly. It now can exist on two different battlefield planes. The ground, and the air level 1. It costs 1 hex of movement to move upward but not downward.

    Additionally, you are immune to environmental effects.

abilities.name: Greater Knitting
abilities.description: Restore %hp% HP to all adjacent undead units

abilities.name: Guardian
abilities.description: As a reaction, can intercept %attacks% attack(s) going towards an adjacent ally. You now take that attack - also take 1 damage.

abilities.name: Guiding Bolt
abilities.description: You hit an enemy with a blast of light, dealing nonabsorbable damage. Next round, allies have +%roll% on all attacks/cantrip strikes against this target.

abilities.name: Knit Flesh
abilities.description: Restore %hp% HP to an adjacent undead unit

abilities.name: Mass Knitting
abilities.description: Restore %hp% HP to all undead units within 2 hexes (100m area)

abilities.name: Multi Attack
Reactive Armor
abilities.description: When an enemy attacks you, gain 1 AC. Lose 1 AC at the start of each turn.

abilities.name: Restoration
abilities.description: Heal a unit 3 HP within spell range.

abilities.name: Smite
abilities.description:
When an attack hits (does damage to HP), you may spend 1 spell slot to make that attack do +%dmg%
      damage

abilities.name: Spellcasting
abilities.description:
You can now cast spells and cantrips. Casting spells and cantrips take action to cast and require 1 spell slot of the coresponding school of magic. 
    Cantrips barrage does not cost a spell slot. 
    
    Range: %range%
    Contentration Bonus: %concentration%

abilities.name: Spirit Guardians
abilities.description: Call upon spiritual guardians to protect you. You gain %ac% AC and adjacent enemies take %dmg% unabsorbable damage at the start of your turn.

abilities.name: Strafing Run
abilities.description: As part of movement can make a breath attack against up to %targets% target(s) (adjacent to each) that you fly over in a straight line. This costs 1 breath attack use and does half breath damage (but full effect). Costs 1 movement to initiate for each targeted hex.

abilities.name: Submarine Transportation
abilities.description: This unit can carry other units on water and underwater. It takes 1 action to load an ally (action used during movement). No action required to disembark.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: Swarm around an adjacent enemy unit, co-existing in their hex, and blocking ranged attacks against targets other than itself. This unit can now move 3 hexes as a reaction to stay with its swarmed unit, any more movement breaks the swarm. In addition it can choose to be hit by ranged attacks that would pass through its hex.

abilities.name: Swimming
abilities.description: If this unit can move up to %movement% hexes in the water. If the unit's speed is less than %movement% it can move up to its speed.

abilities.name: Turn Undead
abilities.description: Deal %dmg% damage to adjacent undead units and force them on their turn to move at least %range% hex away from you and get no closer for %rounds% round.

abilities.name: Versatile
abilities.description: You can choose to take actions prior to movement.

abilities.name: Command
abilities.description: Gain a command aura of %commandRadius% m radius (every adjacent hex)

abilities.name: Rally
Aggressive Commander
abilities.description: Allied units adjacent to this unit can make 1 extra attack, unmodified.

abilities.name: Energetic Commander
abilities.description: Allied units in this units command aura can move 1 extra hex.

abilities.name: Rally+
abilities.description:
As an action, allied units in your command aura regain %hp% HP.

2 units within your command aura can make 1 attack 
OR
1 unit within your command aura can make 2 attacks

abilities.name: Attack of Opportunity
abilities.description: This unit can make a single melee attack (with modified damage) against any enemy that moves out of adjacency with it. The attack takes place immediately.

abilities.name: Professionals
abilities.description: This unit is always active (doesnt count to active unit count).
